    • Klingon Language Certification Program
      • Level I: Hol patlh taghwI', "Beginner"
      • Level II: Hol patlh ghojwI', "Intermediate"
      • Level III: Hol patlh po'wI', "Advanced"
      • Level IV: Hol patlh pab pIn, "Grammarian"

    qep'a' cha'maH HutDIch
    The 29th Annual Meeting of the KLI
    Online Event - July 28-30, 2022

    More Information

    Tickets

    KLI store now has paperback and eBook versions of all our translations in stock, including the Art of War, Tao Te Ching, Ghilgamesh, The Wizard of Oz, and the Rime of the Ancient Mariner!

    Welcome to the Klingon Language Institute. That's right, Klingon. Those bumpy headed aliens of Star Trek really have their own language, one which has far outgrown mere television and film. That's what we're about. We're here to promote and support this unique and exciting language. So, whether you've just stumbled in here by accident, or lost a bet, or have sought long and hard for people who share your passion for the warriors' tongue, come on in. Our site has information and resources to interest both skeptic and enthusiast alike. Join us in our exploration of the galaxy's fastest growing language.

    Need help with translation?

    Got a question about the language you'd like answered? Head over to the Q&A section of the website.

    Ask Your Questions here!

    Join the KLI today!

    Members gain access to many exciting features! HolQeD, fonts, Klingon Language Certification Program Preparation courses and testing, and more!

    Become a Member now!

    Learn Klingon!

     Sign up as a guest of paid member and start your journey to becoming a language Warrior!
